attributes.action: Listen to the people, as its we who run the country not you................
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: a petition to listen to the people, respect us and maybe earn your next term and not given it on a silver spoon. if we stand up now maybe we can save this country from selfish leaders only thinking of saving face rather than the back bone of this country....

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement. See our terms and conditions page http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms for further details about what we accept and don't accept.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
